dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 7, 'MM/DD/YYYY') rc_start, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 14, 'MM/DD/YYYY') rc_end, :LOC locs FROM DUAL

SELECT s.shipment_xid, (SELECT indicator FROM ship_group WHERE ship_group_gid = (SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_xid AND ROWNUM = 1) AND ROWNUM = 1) load_order_flag, sp.servprov_xid carrier_code, cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value loc_code, (SELECT srefnum.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum srefnum WHERE srefnum.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srefnum.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY') comm_id, cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, (SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_xid FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON oob.order_base_gid = vsob.order_base_gid WHERE vsob.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid) contract_number, (SELECT LISTAGG(c.contact_xid,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.order_base_xid) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_xid, oob.order_base_gid, vsob.shipment_gid FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON oob.order_base_gid = vsob.order_base_gid) a INNER JOIN ob_involved_party obp ON a.order_base_gid = obp.order_base_gid AND obp.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' INNER JOIN contact c ON obp.involved_party_contact_gid = c.contact_gid WHERE a.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid) customer_id, (SELECT LISTAGG(srefnm.shipment_refnum_value,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY srefnm.shipment_refnum_value) FROM shipment_refnum srefnm WHERE srefnm.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srefnm.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.TRANSLOADER LOCATION NAME') transloader, loc1.location_xid origin, loc2.location_xid destination, cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value doc_cut, cvr4.charter_voyage_refnum_value ramp_cut, cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_value port_cut, TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid) END),'MM/DD/YYYY') etd, TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN cv.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.arrival_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.arrival_date,cv.dest_location_gid) END),'MM/DD/YYYY') eta, (SELECT COUNT(ssu.ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 20) teu, (SELECT COUNT(ssu.ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 40) feu, (SELECT COUNT(ssu.ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL) units_populated, (SELECT COUNT(ssu.ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1) units_total FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sref.shipment_refnum_value AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN shipment s ON sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN servprov sp ON cv.servprov_gid = sp.servprov_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr4 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr4.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr4.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START RAMP CUTOFF TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr5 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr5.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr5.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START PORT CUTOFF TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (:LOC IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC IS NULL AND sref1.shipment_refnum_value IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt))) AND EXISTS(SELECT ssu.ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1) AND cv.charter_voyage_gid IN ( SELECT cvr.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cvr WHERE cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START RAMP CUTOFF TIME' AND cvr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND (LENGTH(TRIM(cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value)) = 8 AND (TO_DATE(cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'MM-DD-YY') >= TO_DATE(SYSDATE - 7,'dd-mm-rr') AND (TO_DATE(cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'MM-DD-YY') <= TO_DATE(SYSDATE + 14,'dd-mm-rr'))))) ORDER BY TO_DATE(cvr4.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'MM-DD-YY') ASC
